page.enlisting:
Communication Tips Get the person’s attention before starting to communicate Maintain eye contact Keep your face and mouth visible and be sure there is adequate lighting Be aware that having food, gum or other objects in your mouth while talking distorts lip movements Speak clearly and at a moderate pace Use appropriate volume Repeat or rephrase as necessary
Communication Tips
Get the person’s attention before starting to
communicate
Maintain eye contact
Keep your face and mouth visible and be
sure there is adequate lighting
Be aware that having food, gum or other
objects in your mouth while talking distorts
lip movements
Speak clearly and at a moderate pace
Use appropriate volume
Repeat or rephrase as necessary
